alert.note: Alert for Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN WAYNE, NORTHERN UNION, EAST CENTRAL FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA AND WESTERN PREBLE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1215 PM EDT... At 1143 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Connersville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Eaton, Liberty, Camden, Waterloo, Abington, Brownsville, Boston, Richmond Municipal Airport, Goodwins Corner, Oklahoma, West Florence, Mettel Field, Morning Sun, Interstate 70 at US Route 127, Muttonville, Lake Lakengren, New Hope and Springersville. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 3 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
